title: I can't lower down the call volume, even if press the volume down button during a cal - pixel 3a
content:
Hi guys,
Apparently I can't lower down the volume during a phone call. Even if I press the lower down volume button (or up) it stays the same...at maximum. I have to step out of the room if I call someone because others in the room can hear the person who I'm talking to. And no, it's not on speaker :)
Does anyone had this issue and was able to fix it somehow?
Regards,
Radu
